actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of appropriated funds for the purposes of carrying out research, testing, and/or evaluation of poisonous chemicals, biological, or chemical warfare agents upon dogs.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of funds appropriated by any Act for the purpose of carrying out research, testing, and/or evaluation of poisonous gases, radioactive materials, poisonous chemicals, biological, or chemical warfare agents upon dogs.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of appropriated funds for the purposes of carrying out research, testing, and/or evaluation of poisonous chemicals, biological, or chemical warfare agents upon dogs.
